Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 1 -- 1.25 Mills Continuation - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Richland, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one and twenty-five hundredths (1.25) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish, said mills to represent a 0.08 mills increase over the 1.17 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on November 17, 2007 (an estimated $234,167 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purposes of maintaining, operating, improving and supporting the public health unit in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 2 -- 4.75 Mills Continuation - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Richland, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of four and seventy-five hundredths (4.75) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish, said mills to represent a (i) 0.23 mills increase over the 4.52 mills authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on November 17, 2007, and (ii) 0.07 mills decrease from the adjusted maximum millage currently in effect (an estimated $1,334,960 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of operation and maintenance of the Richland Parish Library System?
